snippet: Mrs. Sims, a Democrat in the historically Republican Connecticut town, succeeded in the 1977 race for first selectman after two recounts and a second vote.
abstract: Ruth L Sims, the first woman elected to Greenwich, Conn's, highest executive position, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Sims, a Democrat in the historically Republican Connecticut town, succeeded in the 1977 race for first selectman after two recounts and a second vote.

headline.seo: Ruth Sims, First Woman Elected to Lead Greenwich, Conn., Dies at 92
headline.main: Ruth Sims, First Woman Elected to Lead Greenwich, Dies at 92
headline.print_headline: Ruth L. Sims, 92, First woman Elected to Lead Greenwich
